oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Flooding near the Hard Rock Cafe at the intersection of First Avenue and Broadway in downtown Nashville during the May 2010 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A photograph of flooding near the Hard Rock Cafe at the intersection of First and Broadway in downtown Nashville during the May 2010 flood.
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cumberland River (Ky. and Tenn.); Broadway Avenue (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harris, Scott (Photographer); Metropolitan Nashville and Davidson County Office Of Emergency Management
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219
